notes.voltage_column: Change 'voltage' in column_mapping to the actual column name containing voltage input
notes.velocity_column: Change 'velocity' in column_mapping to match your velocity column name
notes.input_variables: Variables to process in order. Features will appear in this order. For 'current' with derived_features, only derived features appear. For 'velocity'/'voltage' without derived_features, the raw values appear.
notes.derived_features: Features to extract from high-frequency current (10 kHz). Available: rms, peak_to_peak, variance, mean, max, min, slope, zero_crossing_rate. If empty for current, no current features will appear in output.
notes.feature_order: IMPORTANT: Must match simulation config for inference! Default simulation order is ['current', 'angular_velocity', 'voltage']. For real-world, use ['current', 'velocity', 'voltage'] where velocity=angular_velocity.
